title: 820-01949 no boot to HD

title: 820-01949 no boot to HD
message:
Change security settings accordingly and try to boot USB macOS for test.
Also test starting in safe mode.

title: 820-01949 no boot to HD
message:
You may have a problem with internal SSD.
Can you start it in Target Disk mode?
What error do you get on DFU?
